tag_list: gawab-com, mazzika-com, vtls-com, digital-libraries, software-engineering, entrepreneurship
overview:
Hussein Ahmed has a PhD in Computer Science and Applications from Virginia Tech. He has more than nine years of experience in designing and developing web solutions and businesses.

Hussein was one of lead architects behind the largest email provider in the EMEA region, Gawab.com. Hussein led a number of other projects and back-end development for several startups.

His idea of the software business is to focus on the user “wants” and build upon a simple architecture that would accommodate changes and scale.

He is leading now Drupal integrations at VTLS Inc. building search portals for digital libraries across the world.

Reading a lot about software engineering, business management and customer service he blogs at husseinahmed.com with his thoughts and ideas.
